content: "Did you get off with my girlfriend?" "It was just a quick snog on the sofa. It was Christmas. We were drunk. It didn't mean anything."
translations: ita:Te la sei spassata con la mia ragazza﹖. È stata solo una pomiciata veloce sul divano. Era Natale. Eravamo ubriachi. Non
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by sundown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
